name: The RED FOREST (Juan_O)
description:
An astronaut trapped in his routine work of analyzing samples, having as his only escape, his dreams.

Controls:

  • Arrows o ASWD: Move.
  • A (Z) : Interact.
  • B (X) : Equipment and Status.
  • Start (Enter) : Pause.
  • Select (Shift) : To Do List .

Made using  GB STUDIO by Chris Maltby.

Art by JuanO.

Thanks to the Testers

  • Oto
  • Eleazar
